document.full_text: if lance kendricks had the frame of notre dame tight end kyle rudolph, he might give rudolph a run for his money as the best all-around tight end in this class.
document.title: n.f.l. draft: lance kendricks, fourth-ranked tight end
lines_and_colors: if lance kendricks had the frame of notre dame tight end kyle rudolph, he might give rudolph a run for his money as the best all-around tight end in this class.
